ISSUE.TITLE: Text center-aligned instead of left-aligned in dropdown menu
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Bug report - [x] I confirm this is a bug with Supabase, not with my own application. - [x] I confirm I have searched the [Docs](https://docs.supabase.com), GitHub [Discussions](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/discussions), and [Discord](https://discord.supabase.com). ## Describe the bug The text in the dropdown menu is center-aligned instead of left-aligned ## To Reproduce 1. Go to a Supabase project 2. Go to the "Authentication" tab 3. Click on Users 4. Click on the 3 dots next to a user to trigger the dropdown ## Expected behavior The text is left-aligned ## Screenshots ## System information - OS: [macOS] - Brave Browser (if applies) ## Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.
